name: anime-watch-parties
description: A cross-platform extension that synchronizes videos on major anime websites.

scripts.release: npm run build-extension && mkdirp built/Release/Chrome/ && rimraf built/Release/Chrome/Anime-Watch-Parties.crx && crx3 -p built/Release/Chrome/Anime-Watch-Parties.pem -o built/Release/Chrome/Anime-Watch-Parties.crx built/Chrome/
scripts.build-extension: rimraf built/Chrome/ && mkdirp built/Chrome/ && npm run browserify-background-scripts && npm run browserify-content-scripts && npm run browserify-web-accessible-resources && npm run browserify-popup && cpy --parents LICENSE manifest.json src/icons/* src/content-scripts/listener.js src/content-scripts/listener2.js src/content-scripts/listener3.js built/Chrome/
scripts.browserify-background-scripts: rimraf built/Chrome/src/background-scripts/ && mkdirp built/Chrome/src/background-scripts/ && cd src/background-scripts/ && browserify --debug --plugin [ tsify ] backgroundScript.ts -o ../../built/Chrome/src/background-scripts/background-script.js
scripts.browserify-content-scripts: rimraf built/Chrome/src/content-scripts/tab && mkdirp built/Chrome/src/content-scripts/tab && cd src/content-scripts/tab && browserify --debug --plugin [ tsify ] tabScript.ts -o ../../../built/Chrome/src/content-scripts/tab/tab-script.js && echo ";undefined" >> ../../../built/Chrome/src/content-scripts/tab/tab-script.js
scripts.browserify-web-accessible-resources: rimraf built/Chrome/src/web-accessible-resources/ && npm run browserify-web-accessible-resources-chat && npm run browserify-web-accessible-resources-tab && mkdirp built/Chrome/src/web-accessible-resources/js/ && cd src/web-accessible-resources/js/ && browserify --debug --plugin [ tsify ] playerScript.ts -o ../../../built/Chrome/src/web-accessible-resources/js/player-script.js
scripts.browserify-web-accessible-resources-chat: rimraf built/Chrome/src/web-accessible-resources/chat && mkdirp built/Chrome/src/web-accessible-resources/chat/css/ && node-sass --output-style compressed --source-map-contents --source-map-embed --include-path node_modules/ src/web-accessible-resources/chat/css/index.scss built/Chrome/src/web-accessible-resources/chat/css/index.css && mkdirp built/Chrome/src/web-accessible-resources/chat/js/ && cd src/web-accessible-resources/chat/js/ && browserify --debug --plugin [ tsify ] chatScript.ts -o ../../../../built/Chrome/src/web-accessible-resources/chat/js/chat-script.js
scripts.browserify-popup: rimraf built/Chrome/src/popup/ && mkdirp built/Chrome/src/popup/ && cpy --parents src/popup/popup.html built/Chrome/ && node-sass --output-style compressed --source-map-contents --source-map-embed --include-path node_modules/ src/popup/index.scss built/Chrome/src/popup/index.css && cd src/popup/ && browserify --debug --plugin [ tsify ] popupScript.ts -o ../../built/Chrome/src/popup/popup.js

author: Dragicafit
